welcome.title: Hello, I'm
welcome.name: Igor ADANDE
welcome.description: I build modern and performant web solutions, from front-end to back-end, with a passion for innovation and intuitive design.

about.title: About
about.description: I am Igor ADANDE, a programmer analyst and fullstack developer. Young and passionate about innovation, I love creating performant and aesthetic web solutions. A bit of a perfectionist, I strive to deliver polished work, from front-end to back-end, with emphasis on quality and user experience.

projects.title: My
projects.subtitle: Projects
projects.description: Discover my achievements, where innovation, precision and passion meet to create unique digital experiences.

encrypt-dev.title: Encrypt-dev npm Package
encrypt-dev.description: An npm package for encrypting and decrypting environment variables, facilitating secure management of secret key sharing when multiple developers work on the same project.

toolbox-pro.title: ToolBox Pro
toolbox-pro.description: A suite of tools for developers, designers and regular users, offering features like QR code generation, lossless image compression, file conversion, and more.

library.title: Library Management and Book Marketplace Application
library.description: Web application for library management and book marketplace in Benin, created in collaboration with my partner during 2nd year final exams. (under development)

benin-events.title: Benin Event's
benin-events.description: Web application for publishing, promoting, managing events in Benin, created in collaboration with Digital Innovation. (under development)

services.title: My
services.subtitle: Services
services.description: Custom solutions to transform your ideas into digital realities, with innovation and precision.

fullstack.title: Fullstack Web Development
fullstack.description: Creation of modern and performant web applications, from front-end (React, Next.js) to back-end (Laravel, Supabase), with particular attention to scalability and user experience.

uiux.title: UI/UX Design
uiux.description: Design of intuitive and aesthetic interfaces with Figma, optimized for smooth navigation and exceptional user experience.

api.title: API Integration & Backend
api.description: Development and integration of secure REST APIs, with solutions like Firebase and Google APIs, for dynamic and connected functionalities.

optimization.title: Optimization & Maintenance
optimization.description: Improvement of application performance, debugging, and continuous maintenance to ensure optimal reliability and speed.

contact.title: Let's
contact.subtitle: Connect
contact.description: Have a project in mind? Send me a message, and let's discuss how I can help you bring it to life.

form.name: Name
